data.title: Jonathan Jeschke
data.text:
Editorial work for:

Axios Review: Associate Editor, 2017

Basic and Applied Ecology: Book Review Editor, 2012-2020

Conservation Biology: Ad-hoc Editor, 2008-2009

Dataset Papers in Science: Associate Editor, 2012-2017

Diversity and Distributions: Associate Editor, 2011-2015

Ecological Applications: Ad-hoc Editor, 2012-2013

Environmental Conservation: Associate Editor since 2024

Immediate Science Ecology: Associate Editor since 2012

ISRN Ecology: Associate Editor, 2010-2014

Management of Biological Invasions: Associate Editor, 2010-2012

NeoBiota: Associate Editor since 2010

Soil Organisms: Associate Editor, 2007-2018

Reviewer for funding agencies:

Agence Nationale de la Recherche, Alexander von Humboldt Foundation, Canada Council for the Arts, Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft, Genome British Columbia, Israel Science Foundation, Leverhulme Trust, Schweizerischer Nationalfonds, VolkswagenStiftung

Reviewer for scientific journals:

American Naturalist, Aquatic Ecology, Archiv für Hydrobiologie, Basic and Applied Ecology, Behavioral Ecology, Behavioral Ecology and Sociobiology, Biological Invasions, BioScience, Canadian Journal of Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences, Canadian Journal of Zoology, Conservation Biology, Diversity and Distributions, Ecological Applications, Ecological Entomology, Ecological Indicators, Ecological Modelling, Ecology, Ecology Letters, Ecology of Freshwater Fish, Ecosystems, Environmental Management, Evolution, Freshwater Biology, Frontiers in Ecology and the Environment, Functional Ecology, Global Change Biology, Global Ecology and Biogeography, iScience, Journal of Animal Ecology, Journal of Field Ornithology, Journal of Theoretical Biology, Journal of the Royal Society Interface, Journal of Zoology, Limnology & Oceanography, Marine and Freshwater Research, Marine Ecology Progress Series, Methods in Ecology and Evolution, Nature, Nature Ecology & Evolution, Oecologia, Oikos, Peerage of Science, PeerJ, PLoS ONE, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences USA, Proceedings of the Royal Society B, Science of the Total Environment, Trends in Ecology & Evolution, Wildlife Research, etc.

Serving as expert on scientific committees:

Alliance for Freshwater Life (AFL): Board Member and Joint Leader of core area Data & Synthesis since 2017

Berlin Senate: Member of Sachverständigenbeirat für Naturschutz und Landschaftspflege (Expert Advisory Board for Nature Conservation and Landscape Management) since 2024, Member of focus group non-native species for Berlin's Biodiversity Strategy since 2023

BiodivERsA: Evaluation Committee Member for 2011/2012 call

COST Actions: Management Committee (MC) Member of COST Action CA17122 ALIEN CSI (Increasing understanding of alien species through citizen science), 2018-2023; MC Member (Substitute) of COST Action TD 1209 ALIEN Challenge (European Information System for Alien Species), 2013-2017

European Food Safety Authority (EFSA, GMO Panel and Scientific Committee): External Expert, 2010-2015

External examiner: Technische Universität München, 2023; University of Lausanne, Switzerland, 2023; Swansea University, UK, 2023; Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, 2022; Universität Basel, Switzerland, 2022; Friedrich Schiller University Jena, 2021; Université de Fribourg, Switzerland, 2021; Charles University, Prague, Czech Republic, 2020; Durham University, UK, 2020; Monash University, Australia, 2020; Stellenbosch University, South Africa, 2019; Technische Universität Berlin, 2019; Imperial College London, UK, 2017; Queen's University Belfast, UK, 2015

GO FAIR Discovery Implementation Network: Member since 2019

International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN, Commission on Ecosystem Management (CEM) and Invasive Species Specialist Group (ISSG) of IUCN’s Species Survival Commission (SSC)): Expert Member since 2010

Institute Technology-Theology-Natural Sciences (TTN), LMU Munich: Selection Committee Member for the TTN Essay Award 2013 on Green Biotechnology in the Anthropocene

Invasion Dynamics Network (InDyNet): Founder and Head of Steering Committee since 2015

NEOBIOTA: Council Member since 2018

School Kirchseeon, Germany: academic partner for scientific seminar macroecology/macroevolution, 2016
